Logo animation

This is a quick little logo animation I made for my website! The assignment was to "do anything" so I decided to further my brand with this cool animation.

First Tune up UI Animation

This is a UI animation of the first version of my app concept Tune-Up. I later redesigned the UI and made new UI animation.

Stop Motion Animation

This is a stop motion animation that I made for my Motion Graphics 1 class.

Parallax

This was a project for my Interaction Design course. The goal of this project was to create an app for a smart product concept that our classmates came up with. Tune-up connects to the smart device to give you real-time information about your vehicles health and other information such as tire pressure and fuel level, all at your fingertips.

Kinetic Type

A Kinetic type project for my Motion Graphics class. Song: Dr. Thunder by The Amity Affliction
